section.heading: Services requiring immediate supervision by a funeral director.
section.text: An apprentice funeral director shall not perform the following services unless he or she is under the immediate supervision of a licensed funeral director:

para.text: The handling, preparation, or embalming of human remains;
The removal or transport of human remains;
Conducting or directing a funeral; or
Advising consumers making arrangements for the care and disposition of human remains, including arrangements made prior to the death of a person.

annotations.annotation: Licensure, non-health related occupations and professions, see § 47-2853.04.
For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 2082(e) of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).
